bibl.title: New fragments of the Amnesty Decree of October 9, 186 BCE
bibl.note: P. Monts. Roca Inv. 908 fits the left hand side of col. 1 of P. Köln VII, 313 [= P. Kroll]. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 c-d may belong to the same document. - 1. P. Monts. Roca Inv. 908. Oxyrhynchos?, after 186 BCE. - 2. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 c. - 3. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 d.

bibl.title: BASP
bibl.idno: P.Köln inv. 21760 + P.PalauRibes inv. 172a-d + P.Monts.Roca inv. 908

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Köln VII, 313 + P. Monts. Roca Inv. 908 + P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 a P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 c; 172 d
Alba de Frutos García & Sofía Torallas Tovar, New Fragments of the Amnesty Decree of October 9, 186 BCE.

P. Monts. Roca Inv. 908 fits the left hand side of col. 1 of P. Köln VII, 313 [= P. Kroll]. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 c-d may belong to the same document. - 1. P. Monts. Roca Inv. 908. Oxyrhynchos?, after 186 BCE. - 2. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 c. - 3. P. Palau Ribes Inv. 172 d.
